snippet.title: The Slappening | Official GGC Trailer
snippet.description:
The Slappening by Two Headed Studios is a 3D, single player platformer game for PC. Play as a kid trying to escape the school after being traumatized from being slapped after a haircut. Roll around and spit your way through the halls, and avoid the hands at all costs. Discover the handy cast and their quirks as you fight for your neck.

Play the latest version at https://jad-tawbi.itch.io/the-slappening

Team members and roles:

Jad Tawbi, Eskil Ettehag and Guillem Blanch Riambau:  Engineering , Mechanics, Programming, Level Design 

Leo Wognum: Trailer producer, 3D environment and graphics, animation, music & sound design

Desislava Atanasova:  3D environment and graphics, level design

Christian Le Roux:  3D environment and graphics, level design

Peter Mathiesen:  3D environment and graphics, level design

Sarah Norén: Project Manager, UI Designer

Theo Flejmer: GGC responsible, QA lead, UI programmer
